description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

Cultivated by mashing and fermenting toxic weeds found in lonely graveyards, fearweed is a greenish paste magically infused with psychic horror. The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] condition from fearweed can't be removed while the poison lasts.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 @Damage[7d6[poison]] damage and frightened 1 (1 minute)

Stage 2 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} (1 minute)

Stage 3 @Damage[9d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3} (1 minute)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fear].
